name: SCROLL WHEEL ONLY - SCROLL BAIT - GAW3
name_original: SCROLL WHEEL ONLY - SCROLL BAIT - GAW3
description:
1 Week prototype of a larger Game a week project.

I decided to use the scroll wheel to create a fishing game where you have to maintain the mouse over the fish and scroll down to reel the fish in. There are extra time and time defect items, you can play for a high score and get a statistic of the current run. Getting to a point allows for the "Salmon Run".
